text: Kenagera otinka mani'nenka, tima eri tagi treaza hunka, knazane krimpa haviza hu'zanena erinte ama hunka kazama hanigura Ra Anumzamofona asamio. Ana nehunka ne'onse mofavre nagaka'ama zamagaku'ma nehu'zama kuma kankamumpima fri'zama nehaza nagama zamazama hanigura, kazana erisga hunka Ra Anumzamofontega nunamuna huo.
